net.proteusframework.ui.management

Interface ApplicationFunctionContextProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullApplicationContextProvider

    public interface ApplicationFunctionContextProvider
    Application function context provider.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationFunctionContext getContext(Request request)
      Get the context.
      java.util.List<ApplicationFunctionContext> getPossibleContexts(Site site)
      Get the possible contexts for the specified site.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        @Nullable
ApplicationFunctionContext getContext(Request request)
        Get the context.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        Returns:
        the context or null if there is no context available for the specified request.

      • getPossibleContexts

        java.util.List<ApplicationFunctionContext> getPossibleContexts(Site site)
        Get the possible contexts for the specified site.
        Parameters:
        site - the site.
        Returns:
        the possible contexts. Empty list if contexts are not supported.
